interpretation:
The "Person" emoji represents the individuality and uniqueness of each human being. It speaks to the importance of expressing our true selves and embracing our identity. This card encourages us to be confident in who we are and to celebrate our humanity.

The "Person" card can also represent the people in our lives. It may indicate a need to connect with others or seek out new relationships. This card reminds us that we are all connected and that we have a responsibility to treat each other with kindness and compassion.

In a reading, the "Person" card can signify a focus on self-discovery and personal growth. It may indicate a time of self-reflection and introspection. This card encourages us to embrace our individuality and to take ownership of our lives.

Overall, the "Person" card is a reminder to be true to ourselves and to celebrate the humanity in each of us.
